speaker: Back Room
lines: The barkeep slides open the sticking door with two fingers.
The room smells of coin and old ledgers.
A page lists three names and three blanks.
Yours could be one of them.
A man in a clean scarf turns a dagger in his hand.
'Courier job,' he says. 'Light until someone checks.'
He sets a small parcel on the table.
A bookcase behind him looks like a hidden door.

choices.text: Refuse and ask who else is hiring.
Call him on the dagger and see who bleeds first.
